import React from 'react'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product){
Product Not Found
} return

  • {product.name}

  • price : ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0? ( In Stock): (Unavalable) }
; }
